We kindly request a brief proof-of-identity check before proceeding with your request. This ensures that the request comes from the verified account holder and keeps your account secure.

To complete the process, please follow these simple steps:

From the email address associated with your Ndax account OR your new email address, send us an email to support@ndax.io with a selfie of yourself holding a handwritten note with today's date and the words "Email Change" and "Ndax". Please ensure to include your old email address in the note. This will help us verify that the request is legitimate and coming from you.

Include the new email address that you want to use for Ndax going forward in the email.

Please ensure that your arms and shoulders are clearly visible in the photo and that you are holding the note in your hand.

Once our team receives the necessary documents, they will complete your email change request as soon as possible.
